website_summaries.verdict: A top-quality choice for those looking to either save money or accent a smaller kitchen.
pros: The overall quality, from the heavy top to the steel and rubber wheels, is outstanding
Assembles easily in under an hour
cons: Diagram-only instructions not the best help for assembly
Some buyers report that this option arrives with missing or damaged parts

customer_reviews.title: It's really terrific!, not as easy instructions as that Swedish ...
customer_reviews.text: It's really terrific!, not as easy instructions as that Swedish Co., but works. I bought it specifically to slide under the end of my counter- perfect, not only does it fit under, it also fits nicely front to back without taking up any extra room. I removed the basket- now my kitchenaid mixer fits like a charm, clearing off the counter top when I'm not baking- added pics to see the plan. There is no downside to this product if it fits your needs, I live in a small apt, and this snugs up just fine BTW, I'm just a buyer, although it sounds like a paid tester.
customer_reviews.author: Joe K.

customer_reviews.title: Overall a bad purchase
customer_reviews.text: The "wood" is cheap material with lot's of breakage during assembly. Also some of the parts only fit if you put them on backwards? I'm an engineer, and yes there's only 1 way to assemble some of these things and yes that way is actually backwards(holes were drilled in the opposite positions). This results in a product that doesn't really do what it's supposed to do. There was also a sticker on the topmost surface of the granite and that was a pain to remove without using chemicals that I wouldn't want in my food.
customer_reviews.author: Josh aka Patch

customer_reviews.title: Cute cart
customer_reviews.text: Super cute cart. I bought the natural wood option and actually lightly sanded and painted it. Directions could have been a little bit easier to read as some of it didn’t seem well labeled enough, but other than that it was super easy to put together. It also went together quite quickly even though I was the only person putting it together. The granite countertop probably could have had at least two more pegs to hold it on for some extra hold, but it seems to be sitting just fine. Would definitely recommend this if someone’s looking for a smaller cart without sacrificing enough storage.
customer_reviews.author: laurie phillips

customer_reviews.title: Looks great without wire basket too
customer_reviews.text: Looks good and granite top has substantial weight to it. I decided not to install wire basket part and use the bottom for storage.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonUser26

customer_reviews.title: Superb engineering at an affordable price
customer_reviews.text: This would have been a five-star product except for a minor burp in the design: the slide rails for the basket were placed backwards so the basket can only be taken out from the rear. The installation sheet shows them oriented correctly but the holes are drilled on the wrong sides. It wasn't difficult to correct but required new drilling. Otherwise my admiration for the overall design, quality and finish of the wood, and especially the precision of the cuts, the milling and drilling, and labeling of the parts (all of them, down to the tiniest screws!) and the clarity and accuracy of the assembly documentation had me shouting my appreciation. I highly recommend any product by this group.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Robertson

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced and low quality
customer_reviews.text: This is a fairly low quality piece relative to the price. It did come packaged well. I opened it and was happy to find that the hardware was packaged well. Some, but not all, of the pieces were labelled. The directions are awful. Note that you will need a small screw driver and be very careful to not over-tighten as the wood will split. It is together and is doing the job but it is not as sturdy as needed. For $40.00 I suppose it would be okay. If I did not have to take it apart and repackage it, I would be returning.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love this Island!
customer_reviews.text: We returned the first one we received as one shelf was damaged, and that was no problem as UPS was sent to pick it up. The replacement was received with the very same damage. I did not want to return it again, as I like the island so much, especially the granite top, which is great to hold my Foodi-Ninja and a couple of other small appliances. My hubby and I recommend this island, even if one self is damaged!
customer_reviews.author: Cook in Cajun Country

customer_reviews.title: I put it together myself with no help, Yeah!
customer_reviews.text: Many thanks for all the great comments and suggestions on the reviews. You gave a seventy year old with fumble fingers the courage to put this together myself. It took a little time and I made some mistakes but they were easily corrected. This is a sturdy, beautiful looking piece and it fits between my stove and fridge, something that I have been looking for quite a while. It has a lot of storage space and the top will be used when I take things out of the oven. Great directions and everything was well marked for a person like myself.
customer_reviews.author: myrtle

customer_reviews.title: Buy your own glue and replace issued loose dowels with proper fitting ones.
customer_reviews.text: I like the granite top, but I don’t think it will hold up to any lifting of the island by the top. It is held by two loosely fitting dowels. In fact, all of the dowels supplied are two loose to do any good. Be prepared to use carpenters glue if you want a sturdy island. No glue supplied. Instructions are easy to follow, and all you will need is a Phillips screw driver and glue to assemble. I almost forgot, unit mainframe was damaged and I had to repair it. I simply screwed in a 1.5 inch screw and inserted a dowel to cover up the repair.
customer_reviews.author: Rigil

customer_reviews.title: Parts GLUED together!!!!
customer_reviews.text: In attempting to put it together a part where there was a knot in the wood was glued together to hold it together. Needless to say, you could not put a screw in it. This occurred twice on the same shelf!!! Incredibly poor quality control and disappointing for a supposed quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Betty A Manfredonia

customer_reviews.title: perfect for a small kitchen
customer_reviews.text: The top is small. perfect for a small kitchen. We have a larger kitchen and I took advantage of the fact that the marble top just sits on the cart and replaced it with a larger piece of plywood for serving when we have larger family events. Typical lightweight construction isn't going to stand up to rough housing kids but otherwise would make a great small island cart for a single or new couple in a small hosue /apt.
customer_reviews.author: Steven

customer_reviews.title: it's ok
customer_reviews.text: So we got ours to be an add on to our kitchen island, and as excited as i was to order it, i wasn't as excited after it was built. The granite top easily pops off. They don't have it set up to be locked into place, so if you have kids, that could be dangerous. The storage drawer is more shallow than it seems, so you really can't store much in it as you thought you would be able to. Beyond that, looking back I almost wish I got something else. If you are on a budget it may not be a bad deal, but you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Nevitt

customer_reviews.title: Can't beat the value for this price
customer_reviews.text: My house has only 1 drawer and all my cooking utensils have been in a jar on the counter. This option is much nicer and gives me more counter space. The granite top is heavy and didn't arrive scratched though I've seen other buyers have had a problem with that. I chose to leave the wheels off because I am gonna keep it stationary but it's nice that wheels were included in case someone wants to be able to push it around the kitchen during meal prep. 5/5 for ease of assembly and sturdiness but only 4/5 for storage utility just because I wish the main drawer was bigger. 5/5 overall. For $65 this was a great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Lexi

customer_reviews.title: Horrible odor.
customer_reviews.text: Not sure why you want my review since I returned it a while ago. I was very disappointed because, although it seemed to be the perfect item, upon opening the box, it reeked of a chemical odor. I had read about this in online reviews before ordering but thought perhaps it was a fluke and wouldn’t happen with the one I ordered. Unfortunately, it did happen. The smell was awful and the fumes could possibly be dangerous. I returned it and ordered a different brand with which I am very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: We love this so much. We have very limited storage space in our kitchen, and this adds just enough additional pace for us. The top is solid marble. It's pretty heavy actually. We placed our microwave on top, so it's pretty sturdy. It's nice being able to roll it away if we need more space for our kitchen table. The drawer is pretty small, but actually holds a decent amount. I like the wire basket. We use it for bread. The wine rack is a nice touch too. Overall we were extremely satisfied with this purchase. My boyfriend points it out as part of our house tour because he loves it so much.
customer_reviews.author: AlliCat0420

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and useful
customer_reviews.text: This is an attractive, small kitchen island cart. It was easy to assemble. The granite top is heavy and nice. The reason that I give it four stars, rather than five, is that if you are kneading bread, the cart really doesn't hold still enough - even with the wheels locked. It rocks and rolls quite a bit with any heavy dough. It is perfect for rolling out crackers, crusts, etc. - so it's a small complaint really. It provides a heat proof place to put down hot things, another work surface of decent size if you have an extra cook to put to work (in a small kitchen) and overall it's pretty great.
customer_reviews.author: L. Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cart
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this cart for some additional space in my kitchen for my coffee maker and storage below. The package arrived earlier than expected and it was all packaged very well. The instructions were very clear for someone who is used to assembling things, but for me I assembled one or two items wrong and had to change and correct, but for someone else this was probably very simple. First of all i love the fact it's all wood. This cart is very sturdy and for the price you can't beat it. I would definitely recommend this cart if you need just a little additional space. It's a great addition to any kitchen without taking up so much room.
customer_reviews.author: Dee

customer_reviews.title: Not Sturdy But What Do You Expect For The Price?
customer_reviews.text: Not easy to assemble alone. I managed it but ideally, at least one other person is needed to hold the pieces together while you screw the pieces together. I have put together lots of furniture and the engineering of this one is not great. The whole cart is shaky even after all the screws have been tightened. This cart is ideal if you intend to leave it in one spot only. I would worry if you hope to roll it around lots. It looks great though. The granite is heavy and adds a nice look to the whole piece. I would recommend this if you are on a budget.
customer_reviews.author: P Yew

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality and high potential for something to go wrong with assembly
customer_reviews.text: Looks great in pictures, but it is very cheap quality and untrustworthy to put any weight on it and wheel it around. Some pieces had the finish damaged or the wood was splintered. The handle for one screw hole was not well machined and the screw did not tighten the handle. I had a choice of disassembly and returning the product for a refund or a replacement, but I decided to put a microwave on top of it and don't move it. Not worth the money for the amount of frustration and cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: dominic j romanowski

customer_reviews.title: Solid Countertop
customer_reviews.text: This was fairly easy to put together - but the pictures didn't help with the direction of things. Overall it took only 30 minutes to put together. That countertop is really heavy and might be a two person job due to the size of it. The drawer stop at the back isn't well thought out - the plastic stop interferes with items in the drawer. Wheels are good and it isn't easily shifted when using the countertop. The basket has large openings so you can't store small itmes in there. I use the wine rack to store olive oil - super nice that.
customer_reviews.author: Walter

customer_reviews.title: A very useful, sturdy little cart. And the granite is very nice and pretty.
customer_reviews.text: This helps in my 1950s kitchen where I have almost no storage space. The only problem is somehow we put it together wrong, and I cannot slide out the vegetable tray, so watch out for that. I just don't want to take the time and trouble to take it all apart and put it back together again. But if you get one, be sure you put the legs and stops together right, or you'll have the same problem. Aside from that, I love the cart. It is sturdy, and it rolls anywhere I want it to go. I can even use it to put my microwave on top and put silverware in the drawer.
customer_reviews.author: L. Cook

customer_reviews.title: Marble top is not sealed/absorbs food
customer_reviews.text: The marble top is not sealed! This means that food is being absorbed and is staining the surface. I bought this cart as a pasta making station with the intent to roll dough out onto the surface so it's not useful to me at all with that corner having been cut. This cart looks really nice, however the drawer is crooked and doesn't sit quite flush in the assembly, numerous pieces cracked during assembly while making the screws tight enough to avoid flop. Overall; it's pretty but not actually so great.
customer_reviews.author: Courtnee Fallon Rex

customer_reviews.title: Great little kitchen cart and use as my main prep area
customer_reviews.text: I really like the granite top and color but just a bit disappointed by the flimsiness of the wood and drawer. I expected a bit more hardiness to the wood since it does have a heavy piece of granite on top, but the wood pieces seem a bit light, like pressboard, behind the beautiful color covering it. Scared and really cautious not to spill any liquid on wood as I feel like it would weaken the base. The granite top states it is of food grade and taking that as a guarantee as I use it as my prep area for almost every meal.
customer_reviews.author: M C

customer_reviews.title: Solid kitchen addition, but watch out for missing pieces
customer_reviews.text: Pros: easy to assemble, sturdy, nice counter top, drawer is pretty smooth, very cheap overall, small and compact (good addition for kitchens without enough counter/storage space) Cons: was missing the bag of wooden pegs. Fortunately, a local hardware store carried some wooden pegs of different sizes and we found two sets that worked. The only issue was the pegs we found for the countertop had to be cut in half.
customer_reviews.author: JB

customer_reviews.title: Forget old reviews I see a company that made changes and fixed all issues in past reviews
customer_reviews.text: I was a little skeptic on buying this ,but am almost shocked how happy i am about this item it came all pieces individually wrapped carton packed with styro.buffers great instructions wheels that can;t fall off all the things mentioned in the negative reviews i read 'mine is perfect not a blemish one very well made almost like a piece of fine furniture great to see a company with pride I give this item 10 outa 10
customer_reviews.author: ed coulbourne

customer_reviews.title: This kitchen island is simply wonderful! It is easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This kitchen island is simply wonderful! It is easy to assemble. The granite counter is quite heavy, the colour of the wood is nice.. in general you can see that they did not picked the cheapest materials. It is really nice looking; we have had a lot of compliments on it when we have had people over. We bought it because we needed some extra space to put appliances (espresso machine, kitchen aid, etc) and the only thing I regret is that it is so full, we cannot use it as a cutting board. (Also, we are not using the basket since the kitchen aid stand mixer would not fit on the bottom otherwise).
customer_reviews.author: C&C

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The granite top alone is worth the price! This island is very solid. I have a commercial Kitchen Aid and a bread maker on it and it hold the weight with no problem. I would have given five stars but the finish on one part of one leg was noticeably lighter than the rest of the finish. Assembly was not difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It's Great BUT...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this kitchen island (5 star) and it was easy to put together (4 Star) EXCEPT the 2 screws included to attach the handle are not long enough. So, it isn't finished and I'm going to have to make a trip to the hardware store and hope I can find a longer screw with the same threading. It is beautiful, and the granite top makes the whole thing solid and easy to clean. But I need longer screws!!!!! HELP!
customer_reviews.author: Chance

customer_reviews.title: Great looking, solid, kitchen cart!
customer_reviews.text: Good solid cart - easy to assemble; all parts were there and holes lined up perfectly. Use for our coffee maker (K cup style) niche: coffee maker, rotating rack for K cups, creamer & sugar containers easily fit on the cart top, with plenty of work space to stir your cup of coffee and add desired creamer/sugar/etc. The drawer is solid, slides well, as does the wire basket. Plenty of storage room on the lower shelf (using wicker baskets to store lots of k cups). perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Rodger C. Niemeier

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: I was very pleased with the quality. The finish was so nice, much better than I expected for the very reasonable price. I am a senior citizen and a woman and I was able to put it together with no problem. All the pieces were there and fit perfectly. And the granite top is very nice quality. I wanted it to put my Megahome distiller on and it is the perfect size and with the granite top I won't have to worry if I spill water on it.
customer_reviews.author: Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Excellent table
customer_reviews.text: This is one of my better purchases from Amazon. I have my big old mixer on it, so I can wheel it over to the counter, and all my parts to the mixer are right in that drawer. I use the wine rack for larger parts for the mixer, and the shelf is for my trays and paper plates. The bottom shelf has my bread slicer on it. All in all, it's a great time and back saver.
customer_reviews.author: sheila

customer_reviews.title: handy little cart
customer_reviews.text: Really handy little cart for our coffee pot, etc. Relatively easy to assemble: would have been nice to have the instructions more clearly identify, top/bottom, front back.... biggest issue was that the cart wreaked of smoke. Had to assemble in the garage, let it air out then wipe down with vinegar and let stand for a couple of days. After a week, it is almost smoke free.
customer_reviews.author: just responding so I don't get fined

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: I converted this to a side table in one of my treatment rooms in my spa. It makes a great table to have the wax on because if any spills, it’s easily removable for clean up. Also taking out the middle rack helps to fit a towel warmer on the bottom shelf. The middle hanging basket was nicely repurposed as a fruit basket for guests so that no big pieces of this cart went to waste. All in all it was definitely a great purchase. I would definitely order this again and recommend. I will likely buy a second one in due time.
customer_reviews.author: Felicity Duran

customer_reviews.title: Pretty solid, easy to assemble.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions that come with this unit must be followed to the letter. I'm pretty handy when it comes to assembling things like this, but I did have to backtrack a bit and reassemble a couple of things. No problem, though. The instruction were well illustrated, step by step, etc. It did come with an Allen key for tightening bolts. The granite counter top of this table has got to weigh 30 or 40 lbs. It's heavy, and helps to add to the overall stability & sturdiness. It looks really nice in out dining room.
customer_reviews.author: Marty P.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this to make a small coffee station. They didn't have exactly what I wanted so I we ordered the wood color and then painted it a soft black color. Turned out amazing and the black looks pretty with the top. The drawer slides smoothly so far and it holds our kurig, k tray, our blender, and we keep stuff in the drawer as well. I did not like the original wood color but I bought it knowing I was going to paint it. Very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Liz

customer_reviews.title: It is more than adequate
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to put my Ninja Foodie on. There is enough room for the extra lid and the various racks that go with it, although the racks are awkwardly stacked. It is just the right size for the space I have. I can wheel it out and back when I use it. I saw a couple of reviews about a foul smell, mine doesn't smell.
customer_reviews.author: Steven B.

customer_reviews.title: Use this in my motorhome...works great.
customer_reviews.text: Great product...easy to assemble and sturdy afterwards. And the company support is amazing. This island fell over during travel...causing the drawer to break. I wrote to the company asking for a replacement drawer front and how much they would charge. IT WAS SHIPPED FREE TO ME JUST DAYS LATER! Wow....that was unexpected...but Thank You Linon Company.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Kimball

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful and practical
customer_reviews.text: It looks just like the picture in real life, so I feel no need to post any pictures. I live in a very small apartment and have virtually no counter space between my toaster, coffee pot, and dish rack. I keep this next to the fridge and when it's time to prepare food I roll it right out and get to work. All the hardware is made really smart, and seems to be built to last. Even the wheels have metal casting on them, which is a good thing because that is one heavy Granite top.
customer_reviews.author: CocaNilla

customer_reviews.title: Must have for small kitchens!
customer_reviews.text: This made a world of difference in my small kitchen. I live in a small one bedroom apartment and desperately needed a cutting area. This island is sturdy enough to cut on plus holds my mixing bowls, strainers, knives, cutting boards, and I can still leave the top empty!! Took me about 20 minutes to put together and nothing arrived damaged. It's affordable and sturdy exactly what I was looking for.
customer_reviews.author: Steph

customer_reviews.title: Attractive and easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: This cart was the perfect size for my small table top electric/charcoal grill. I chose this particular cart because of the granite top and am very pleased with the quality of the granite. Delivery exceeded expectations with package arriving undamaged. Assembly was easy with all parts clearly marked accompanied by great picture illustrations in the assembly guide. The wheels glide smoothly and easily on my wood deck. As to negatives, the drawer is gapped on one side even after assembling according to direction and there was no way to correct the gap, and it would be a great if plugs {which I purchased at the lumber store) were included to cover the noticeable screw holes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: This works great as a coffee cart for my Keurig. The drawer holds a lot of the pods, and the bottom shelf holds a lot of my coffee mugs, freeing up cabinet and counter space. The basket hold additional pods, and there is also a handy wine rack. The granite top is beautiful, and the cart is very sturdy and well made. Great value for the price!
customer_reviews.author: MARCIA LAMBERT

customer_reviews.title: Functional & perfect for my space
customer_reviews.text: This replaced a very heavy large wheeled kitchen island that fit snuggly under a short stair kitchen storage closet. What a difference in size, ease of use & feel! Just right in fit & function. Granite top a bonus. The basket is perfect for keeping onions, potatoes, yams, fall squashes - recommend putting a breathable mesh on bottom to decrease debris from falling through.
customer_reviews.author: JPMoon

customer_reviews.title: Solid Purchase
customer_reviews.text: I was pleasantly surprised by this product. I moved into a new home that turned out not to have a silverware drawer and needed a quick fix which let me to order this. I was surprised by the quality for the price and it perfectly assimilated into the kitchen. The wine rack is a wonderful added bonus. Honestly, such a solid purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Madeline

customer_reviews.title: Truly great quality, compact, and attractive
customer_reviews.text: My need was a cart to hold a Breville toaster-convection oven in a relatively small space. This cart is working perfectly for that. It probably took me longer than most to put it together, as it was my first time assembling something like this. However, the directions could not have been any more clear. I searched for weeks for a cart and even created a spreadsheet. This was the best on "paper" and has proven itself in "person." Delivery was quick. It arrived five days earlier than expected. The drawer is a bonus for me, as I live in a small city apartment without much cabinet space. I couldn't be happier with it.
customer_reviews.author: Ona K.

customer_reviews.title: Assembly impossible
customer_reviews.text: Are you kidding me? The instructions are awful. You need a furniture builder for this. There is no step by step just four pages of blueprints. I’m so angry I really need to put my microwave on a cart and this is undoable. I didn’t even open the rest of the box. Returning.
customer_reviews.author: Angela

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I really like this cart. It looks nice and I especially like the stone top. It was easy to put together by myself with the instructions provided. The only thing that I had any problems with is the drawer. It's a little flimsy in comparison to the rest of the cart, but it's fine for lightweight items. Good cart for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Rescue Cats

customer_reviews.title: Useful item
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item to help save counter space in my small kitchen, It was a little bit difficult as the instructions were not very clear, but once assembly was completed I have been very happy with this purchase. Over the past year I have used it to store multiple items including spices in the drawer, wine on the wine rack, toaster oven, and coffee maker. The item has wheels so it can be moved around the kitchen easily and it fits perfectly between my refrigerator and my stove. I also enjoy the marble top which is very easy to clean. This item is a good value for anyone who has a small kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Natalie Compton

customer_reviews.title: A little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: It's not bad for the price but was very disappointed in the condition it arrived in. There was a crack in one of the pieces and several scrapes in the wood. I had already pulled all of the pieces from the box that by the time I saw the flaws, it wasn't worth trying to wrap and try to get it back in the box to return. Also, it wasn't quite the color that I thought it was, but it will do
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is the perfect size for my tiny kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect size for my tiny kitchen. And it's a really great quality - especially for the price. A nice heavy top. Body seems sturdy enough. Assembly instructions weren't great, but I manged to get it together without having to take apart and reassemble anything. One minor design flaw - the on/off tab for wheel locking is just long enough that it dragged on the floor when I rolled the cart. The wheels also don't feel very secure in the legs.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best. Instructions. Ever!
customer_reviews.text: Okay, so not only is this really nice and well made from quality materials - but it was SUPER easy to build! The instructions were so well organized, all the parts were labeled clearly - i wish EVERYONE (looking at you IKEA!) would adopt this companies instructions model. But, beyond that, the table is perfect. High quality, sturdy, attractive. Just a fantastic piece of furniture.
customer_reviews.author: asineth

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful item but...
customer_reviews.text: Love the finished item!! Not in love with the directions. I put it together myself and was almost done when I realized the drawer was in backwards and it couldn’t stay that way. The rack is still in backwards but since I won’t be using it as a wine rack it isn’t an issue. It is perfect for what I needed it to be.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Topf

customer_reviews.title: perfect coffee station
customer_reviews.text: This is a well made cart. Easy to assemble the directions were very helpful. The granite is very nice. A little advice the little wooden caps to hide the screws pop out , using a little wood glue was what I used to keep the plugs in place. 5 star purchase for me. The price was great and the quality of this cart exceeded my expectations.
customer_reviews.author: nanna BB

customer_reviews.title: A little rickety
customer_reviews.text: The granite top seems to be too heavy for the base. It feels unstable. But it's attractive and adds lots of storage. Also pretty short. Have to sit down to chop things on it and I am only 5'2".
customer_reviews.author: lffannin

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful product, buy this!
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful product once completed. My 14 yr old son and I finished assembling in just over a hour. We did have difficulty with a few pieces labeled that weren’t clear on which direction to assemble (literally instruction 1) but after we got passed that, it was easy! The granite top is lovely. I am very pleased with the price and finished product. Highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: KDE

customer_reviews.title: I like it
customer_reviews.text: I was worry about this order because it doesn't have many reviews. I don't really trust amazon review. Anyway picture is most important review than people said something! (in my case) You can see what you need and thing about it. I wanted buy this one for my microwave on the top. It is good for me! i also love wine space. I used middle part for my vegetables. I wanted a wooden design and love it
customer_reviews.author: Han

customer_reviews.title: Works pretty well!
customer_reviews.text: Everything went together well except drawer pull. The two screws provided were not long enough. So either the back of drawer was to be dimpled or longer screws. They didn't even poke out of length of holes?? All other acres were accounted for in their positions. Otherwise I loved product. Shipped well!
customer_reviews.author: Laura L. Donaldson

customer_reviews.title: Stylish & Sturdy. Good $$.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t like the coffee stain on the marble top that I put there in the first week. Otherwise it’s Great! If anyone has a marble cleaner that removes coffee stains. I would “love you forever.”
customer_reviews.author: GKB

customer_reviews.title: Tricky to put together but looks sturdy and the granite counter top is great
customer_reviews.text: Tricky to put together but looks sturdy and the granite counter top is great, and thus far appears quite sturdy. I ended up taking off the wheels to stabilize the piece given an uneven floor surface. A 18" (L) x 13" x 8" (H) in wicker drawer from TJ Max fit perfectly in the space below the metal basket.
customer_reviews.author: SamJones

customer_reviews.title: Beautifully Functional
customer_reviews.text: I love this cart, bought one for myself last year, handy locking wheels are awesome, especially for chopping food at the stove. I bought one same one, for my boyfriend as a house warming gift because his preparation space is minimal. It also serves as a silverware drawer, and holds his water bottles in the wine rack, potatoes and onions in the basket!! anyway, get creative this cart is the Bomb!! I love it.
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Stroud

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for a kitchenette setup
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this kitchen cart. It was fairly easy to assemble, love the granite countertop. It's a very sturdy cart and one is capable of wheeling it around. It even has a wine rack. The price was very reasonable. It's perfect for any location I imagine, mine is setup in my room with a hotplate to avoid my housemates pigsty of a kitchen.
customer_reviews.author: Gabrielle

customer_reviews.title: Granite has very strong smell.
customer_reviews.text: The granite top adds to instability. Very heavy granite and yes it has a chemically smell that lasted for about two weeks. Not sure what that's about but I'm concerned about prepping food on the granite bc of smell. Also, onlt two teeny dowel pieces to hold granite to table frame so I also used glue to secure it on base.
customer_reviews.author: Margaret Vanaman

customer_reviews.title: Design flaws! Be careful!
customer_reviews.text: This is cute as heck, but has 2 design flaws: 1.) The lower shelf is not connected to the unit at all. It just sits there, waiting for the next household pet to push it onto the floor. 2.) The VERY heavy granite top is only held on by two TINY wooden pegs!!! Be sure to secure it with glue! I can see this tipping over onto a kid pretty easily, as it is very top heavy.
customer_reviews.author: LacyJade

customer_reviews.title: WOULD BUY AGAIN.
customer_reviews.text: BOUGHT FOR MY SISTER WHO NEEDED A BIT MORE WORK SPACE IN THE KITCHEN. THIS LITTLE TABLE FIT NICELY INTO HER GALLEY KITCHEN, THE REALLY BEAUTIFUL GRANITE TOP IS PERFECT AND EASY TO CLEAN. GAVE 3 STARS FOR ASSEMBLY EASE...MAYBE SHOULD HAVE BEEN 4-5. NO MORE DIFFICULT THAN ANY PUT-TOGETHER AND TWO ELDER WOMEN MANAGED IT IN ABOUT AN HOUR. STURDY, PRETTY, PRACTICAL ADDITION TO SMALL SPACE.
customer_reviews.author: WV2VT

customer_reviews.title: Love  this mobile storage unit
customer_reviews.text: I am super pleased with this product. I got it for a little extra storage space in our kitchen, and it's perfect in a small space. Instead of tossing our keys and whatnots on the countertops, they have a home in this little storage caddy. It's well-built, and the top slab is lovely and gives it a more expensive look. I love the mobility of it and that it has a wine holder. Some similar items cost 2-3 hundred dollars, so I was happy this is a great product for less money.
customer_reviews.author: Claire M.

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy this one!!!
customer_reviews.text: Extremely poorly made. Very hard to read directions so it makes it difficult for assembly. I can not stress enough, DO NOT PURCHASE THIS!!!! Cheap and low quality wood.
customer_reviews.author: Lis guipre

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Well packed, clear directions, easy to assemble. My assistant & I put this together one Saturday afternoon while watching old cowboy reruns. i recommend when assembling that all pieces be laid out and reviewed with the instructions. Very happy with end result!
customer_reviews.author: jmb02129

customer_reviews.title: Easy assembly for a nice addition to my kitchen
customer_reviews.text: This was just the right size to use as a center "island" for my tiny cottage kitchen. The granite top gives it stability. I like the combinations of drawer, wine rack, wire basket and shelf. It solved my storage problem in a stylish way and is very useful to me. It came in good condition, quick delivery, and was pretty easy for me to assemble.
customer_reviews.author: Christine Cortese

customer_reviews.title: Beauty, function,  built MYSELF!!
customer_reviews.text: I Can't believe how adorable and functional this cart is!! I was able to put this together I 1 hour . The directions were very clear. The packaging was perfect this shipped to me in Italy, no damage. It comes with everything needed except for the flat screwdriver. The granite piece itself is close to 1 inch thick, it is VERY heavy, and very beautiful. I am ordering another one for my future daughter-in-law. If you're considering buying one of these do not wait!!! Chubby dog model shown for size😜
customer_reviews.author: Brittww

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for a kitchenette
customer_reviews.text: The directions aren’t the best but it’s not rocket science. The predrilled holes on 1 side of the draw was in the wrong place. I had to drill my own. There were a few small cracks in the wood and a scratch upon opening but nothing worth returning it over. I did use wood glue for the dowels.
customer_reviews.author: BeautifulTee

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy rolling cart
customer_reviews.text: I love this fabulous cart. It is sturdy enough to hold my very heavy appliances, at a level I can reach. This rolling cart adds extra space to my condo kitchen. My husband did replace the wheels with bigger ones to facilitate a quiet move on our tile. Plenty of storage under the marble top for appliance accessories and booklets, plus large bowls and platters.
customer_reviews.author: Roger G.

customer_reviews.title: Love This!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this as a "coffee station" to put both my Keurig and Mr. Coffee on top. I put the K-cups in the drawer and use the wire drawer for my bulk coffee and filters. It works great and looks great. Assembly took some time, as the directions are not great. But if you take your time, everything fit together just fine. Looks like it cost more than it really did!
customer_reviews.author: Anne Marie Beekman

customer_reviews.title: Very usable product and fairly easy to assemble
customer_reviews.text: Very usable product and fairly easy to assemble. It only got 4 out of 5 stars for two reasons: 1) It has some open holes on the sides from the assembly process that take away some of the attractiveness of the product. 2) one of the side parts of the drawer handle still wobbles. Still, these are minor, and the island is very convenient -- great size. Nice granite top, too!
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: Good buy, perfect for a small island.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a little wobbly, but for the price I don’t think it could be better. It has a high quality grainy top, locking casters, storage for 4 bottles of wine, some veggies, and my crock pot in the bottom shelf with plenty of space for a cutting board on top.
customer_reviews.author: Kyle

customer_reviews.title: I loved it. I servers my purpose
customer_reviews.text: I loved it. I servers my purpose. Its very lite and easy to assemble. Only the Granite part is heavy. Not sure How long that lite wood can take the weight of Granite. I just got it a week ago. So far its great. If not for Granite it might have costed less. But Granite is food for my cooking ware.
customer_reviews.author: Kalyani

customer_reviews.title: Quality product at a reasonable price
customer_reviews.text: I found this to be a high-quality and good-looking product that is priced very reasonably compared to similar items. Assembly is a bit tedious but is not difficult. The parts all have numbered stickers on them, which helps greatly, but make sure you look at the pictures carefully so that you don't put a piece in backwards, upside down, etc. Once assembled, it is solid and sturdy and looks quite nice, especially the granite top.
customer_reviews.author: Peter B

customer_reviews.title: HOSPISE IS BETTER WITH THIS CART
customer_reviews.text: My Sister uses it for prep work as she has a small kitchen with little counter spave. The cart comes in handy as she is in awheel Chair and it is just her height. She keeps her vegetables in the basket that are to be prepped, and the knives in the draw. She love her little cart, no more sitting on the floor to prep for my sister. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Works great and looks pretty
customer_reviews.text: We never used our dish washer that came with our house so we sold it and filled the hole with this. Works great and looks pretty
customer_reviews.author: Glamazon

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality For the Price
customer_reviews.text: Great piece to add to the kitchen for more counter space. The quality is really high for the price, and it came very well packaged - the granite top was wrapped in foam wrap and bubble wrap. The assemble part was straight forward but did take some time, but worth it in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Alicia R. Jones

customer_reviews.title: 4star
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice cart but directions were terrible . I could not put it together. So my nephew did and he said the same thing . It took him 2 hrs The cart is nice but the granite top does not sit in so well so that is a little shaky . Otherwise storage nice .
customer_reviews.author: AnneMarie

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected to be, disappointed, but I am making it work since I like the color
customer_reviews.text: It is not as sturdy as stated, I received shipments with a damaged front part of one of the drawers, I did not want to deal with the hassle of returning and getting a replacement while moving so I fixed it with nail glue. It was missing one screw and the drawer screws were not long enough to put together, so I had to go to local hardware store twice to get the right screws to finish setting up so that I can start using it. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice, sturdy cart.
customer_reviews.text: Nice, sturdy cart. All parts are labeled with numbers and letters. Connector parts are all bagged with each one labeled. Nothing missing. Instruction sheets are drawings clearly showing how to put the puzzle together. Just put parts together by following the pictures. A couple parts had a few nicks from transport from China. Beautiful polished granite top. Cart is amazing for the price.
customer_reviews.author: lsagmagic

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great!
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly what my tiny kitchen needed. It's extra storage AND prep space, PLUS it's mobile!! It really looks high-end because of the granite top. It was relatively easy to assemble, and it's made of real hardwood, not pressed MDF. Great deal for the price! If I had room I'd but another one!
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne Evans

customer_reviews.title: Solid granite top and solid wood base
customer_reviews.text: This "cart" is more like a piece of furniture - SO nice! Not too terrible to assemble - maybe 30 minutes on your own. Solid granite top is beautiful and the base is solid wood. For the price, what a find!
customer_reviews.author: TFA

customer_reviews.title: Inferior parts, no replacements
customer_reviews.text: The screws are too small by half to attach the drawer handle and the drawer front sides instantly cracked when I inserted into the cabinet slot. Company does not have replacement parts and it is pain in the butt to return. But I can share a pic and bad review and never buy Linon again.
customer_reviews.author: M. Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Looks expensive and matches our cupboards and the top is very close to our counters
customer_reviews.text: We placed it on a blank wall in the kitchen, the size is just right for what we wanted. It is used as a tea station with potato storage in the basket. We are not wine drinkers however the wine rack is a great place to store our English muffin packages. They just tuck away in the space.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sturdy cart that fits my space perfectly
customer_reviews.text: This cart fits perfectly in the corner of my dining area. It holds my coffee machine and instant pot so I can free up kitchen counter space. Real granite top. It is really pretty and sturdy. The wheels do not click into the legs but I don't need the wheels so it does not bother me at all. Similar carts are priced a lot more elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: New Owner

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful granite topped natural wood cart.
customer_reviews.text: Directions could be difficult for those who are not mechanically minded. Took me, a 61 yr old female about 40 minutes. I did run a bead of wood glue around drawer bottom groove before inserting bottom, as well as glue coating wooden dowels before inserting. Absolutely love my cart. Very sturdy. Wish they had sent covers for screw holes. Will make my own with a dowel. I am ordering another one for my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Reba

customer_reviews.title: Real granite top, was pleasently surprised
customer_reviews.text: Counter top is solid granite and gives the island stability once in place. Just take you time slowly with the instructions and you will not be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Cody Wadding

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful Cart!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this kitchen cart for a small spot in my kitchen to hold extra items. The car is beautiful, sturdy and exactly as described. The piece of grainite for the tops is a nice solid slab and a nice greyish color that matches my kithen perfectly. I ordered the cherry color and it is exactly that. A deep reddish brown color - beautiful. We had to put it together but had no problem - and neither me nor my husband are very handy. I recommend this cart to everyone. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Seems strong enough,  young kids assembled
customer_reviews.text: I'm a man, would like solid hard wood construction, was a little busy so she bought this, she and the kids assembled it no problem. I prefer closed storage. Its been holding up so far 3 months in.
customer_reviews.author: Jon M.

customer_reviews.title: Kiki in New York, Ny
customer_reviews.text: One of the best purchases I’ve made thus far, wood and granite is good quality and it doesn’t look cheap. All parts and screws are labeled which was good thing and they where in English; I defiantly recommend putting it together with someone to make the job easier and faster. overall money well spent I give this product 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: We use this ever day for ninja foodi
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my ninja foodi. This product is very sturdy. I wheel it from one side of the kitchen to the other at least once a day (to get to the outlets). The instructions can be a bit frustrating. I did have to redo a few things to get it correct but it was well worth it. My advice is to keep the label stickers on every piece and don’t just toss everything out of the box. I would buy this again. This is well worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: bobo

customer_reviews.title: The cart is perfect for what I need.
customer_reviews.text: Part of the leg was cracked but it seems to be holding up. It was so heavy I would never have been able to pack it up and sent it back. I did not put the wheels on and it seems to be sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Burke

customer_reviews.title: Works as expected
customer_reviews.text: It workswell for the price, you can put it together without tools in about 1 hour, works better with help. The granite top kinda stains when mixed with greasy substances, but mostly comes off. Wheels don’t lock very well, but it shouldn’t roll around your kitchen-at least mine doesn’t.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor, except for the granite
customer_reviews.text: Generally poor all the way around except the granite. Very poor instructions, cheap part that break and/or do not line up so the screws split the wood. The top is heavy for the light weight structure on the wood, I hope it stays together. I gave it two stars for the granite and it iscwhat it says, but if expecting quality look elsewhere.
customer_reviews.author: Cazaril

customer_reviews.title: Engineering degree required for assembly
customer_reviews.text: This is just what I need for my small kitchen, as I love to cook. However, I may never get it assembled. The instructions are much worse than Ikea could ever dream up! Too many components listed in each step. I can read a blueprint and conceptualize the finished product, but not here! Any tips from other customers? FYI, I am a vet at assemble yourself & never complained before this...
customer_reviews.author: C. Glynn

customer_reviews.title: Terrible product!! Do not buy this!!
customer_reviews.text: Nicks and scratches everywhere. Terrible to assemble!! Even simple screws for drawer handle are too short! It was too heavy for me to take to return- had to visit the hardware store. The drawer didn't fit in unless it was hammered! Nothing to secure the wheels once placed in. Piece of garbage!! Do not go through the trouble I did!!
customer_reviews.author: RW

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive Add-on!
customer_reviews.text: I always wanted an island in my kitchen & since I don't have a lot of money to remodel my kitchen right now, I went the cheaper route of buying one of these. It fits my standards. I needed a little more of counter space & areas to put more things, like for example potholders! My kitchen has a total of 2 drawers in it, which I hate! Now, I have an extra drawer. I love that this is on wheels too, whenever I need to use the counter on top....I can just roll it on over to my cooking area! It's perfect for my needs :)
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Verlengia

customer_reviews.title: So much regret.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality. The cart arrived and the wood is warped so that the drawer won't even close. So now I have a drawer hanging open. The holes didn't align at all, I had to use a power drill to line them up myself. After having the thing put together it feels like it's going to fall over if I try to move it. I, absolutely, would NOT buy this. You get what you pay for, I suppose!
customer_reviews.author: C.A. Jenkins

customer_reviews.title: Good buy! Nice quality!
customer_reviews.text: This was surprisingly high quality for the price! It went together in a couple of hours with only a little help from my 12 year old master builder and his electric screwdriver. I love the granite top, which is nice & heavy! I bought this to hold our family popcorn machine, because the matching cart was way more expensive than I would pay for a storage cart.
customer_reviews.author: TexasMomma

product_meta.title: Linon Kitchen Island Granite Top, 33.88" x 22.8" x 15.63", Natural
product_meta.description: Color:DaaA contemporary take on storage and display, this efficient kitchen island expands your kitchen work space in a compact Silhouette. Equipped with a fixed shelf, pull out drawer and slide-out basket overtop. 2 locking caster wheels, you can easily keep cooking and cleaning essentials within reach, making this kitchen cart perfect for prepping large meals. Store your favorite champagne options in the bottle wine rack with ease, and after using the granite top as a cutting board, Simply Clean it off to make it the perfect display tabletop. Can accommodate compact microwave ovens.
feature_bullets: Natural finish work island featuring an elegant granite top.
Slide out wire storage basket and one fixed shelf.
4 bottle wine storage rack. Mircowave Safe.
Spacious pull out storage drawer and chrome finished hardware.
Heavy duty locking rubber casters for easy mobility and safety - Do not use this item without casters, without casters there is a chance this item can damage/scratch your floor.
Distance from Bottom Shelf to Bottom of Basket: 8. 5"
Top/Shelf Weight Limit: 150 lbs, Total Weight Limit: 300 lbs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars1,219 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
